profile.summary: Highly skilled React.js developer with over 3+ years of experience and a strong track record in problem-solving. Motivated to find optimal solutions for various cases and scenarios. My technical expertise,unwavering enthusiasm, and commitment to excellence make me a valuable asset to any development team.

works.title: Front End Engineer

works.title: Front End Engineer
description: Successfully implemented the migration of the front-end section from ADF (Java) to the new design using React, resulting in improved performance and enhanced user experience

Spearheaded a team of front-end developers in creating a robust web application for a bank project. Leveraged React as the primary framework, Redux Toolkit for efficient state management, and Material-UI for visually appealing and intuitive UI components, resulting in a seamless user experience
